messages.inactivity: You haven’t used Suki for an hour, so to help with security we’ve signed you out.

emrSignIn.title: EMR Sign-In
emrSignIn.message: You’ll be redirected for a moment to sign into your EMR, then directed back.

forgotPassword.heading: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.message: Please enter your Suki account email address, then check your email to finish resetting your password.
forgotPassword.tip: If the supplied email address is valid, you should receive an email shortly with instructions on resetting your password. If you did not receive an email and still require assistance, please contact support@suki.ai

find.label: Find answers.
find.text: Check out the Suki Help Center for FAQs & tutorials.

play.label: See an example.
play.text: Watch how Suki can help you create notes.

chat.label: Or chat with us.
chat.text: Message us if you cant find what you need above.

emptyPatientList.text1: Add Patients to your list to create notes for them.
emptyPatientList.text2: Remove them when you no longer treat them.

introScreen2.heading: Hello, I’m Suki.
introScreen2.description: To get started, here’s a brief video that shows how I can help you create a note.

gettingStarted.heading: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Try these actions or voice commands

top.description: The Suki Assistant Windows app lets you use the intelligence of Suki to dictate in any field or application on a Windows computer. Download the latest version now.

right.description1: This release introduces voice commands to the Suki Windows app. With this update, in addition to dictation, you can now use your Suki scripts in any application on a Windows computer.
right.description2part2: See an animation and hear an audio tone that confirm when Suki has understood a command
right.description2part3: As a first-time Suki user, login to the Windows app directly, even if you've never used another Suki application
right.description3: Dictating “next line” or “next paragraph” does not work on the Assessment and Plan screen in the Athena EHR

top.heading2: Your account has been successfully created. You’re ready to start using Suki Assistant to save time on administrative tasks.

section1.heading: Mobile
section1.description: Use anywhere with an internet connection.

section2.heading: Web
section2.description: Full Assistant experience in a larger form factor.

registerSuccess.footerText: The Suki name and logo are trademarks of Suki AI, Inc. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. © 2021 Suki AI, Inc.
